title: The Halden Protocol Unleashed
outcome: Oksana activates the secret Halden Protocol, releasing recordings Halden made of Council corruption, manipulation, and backroom deals. The city erupts as citizens confront leaders and demand justice. The vanished take center stage and force a full reckoning with the BCI era's darkest secrets, as revelations connect Halden's intentional death to a planned mass exposure meant to shatter manufactured order forever.

events.description: Oksana discovers an encrypted data vault labeled 'Halden Protocol' left within the BCI core, only accessible after civic self-governance is chosen.
Halden's recorded files are broadcast citywide, revealing incriminating conversations and secret agreements between Council factions over the past three years.
Public outrage explodes. Thousands flood the city center. District leaders and vanished citizens demand Council resignations and independent oversight of all archives.
The Council, unable to contain public anger, is forced to dissolve. An interim citizen assembly dominated by vanished and reformist leaders takes over key city functions.
A final Halden message is released: he engineered his own death to guarantee the truth would outlive him and free Stenograd from algorithmic rule forever.
